CHAT.comment: NATIONAL AERONAUTICS AND SPACE ADMINISTRATION, ET AL., Petitioners v. ROBERT M. NELSON, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GENERAL NEAL K. KATYAL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAN STORMER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF NEAL K. KATYAL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-titled matter was submitted.)
